channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Far Future Expiry Header
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Far Future Expiry Header

item.title: CVE-2021-24799|2024-08-03T19:42:17.210Z -- unknown -- far%20future%20expiry%20header
item.description: The Far Future Expiry Header WordPress plugin before 1.5 does not have CSRF check when saving its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack.
